name: S3ReplicationConfiguration
description: ReplicationConfiguration is a property of the AWS::S3::Bucket resource that specifies replication rules and the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) uses to replicate objects.

properties.name: Role
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that Amazon S3 assumes when replicating objects. For more information, see How to Set Up Cross-Region Replication in the Amazon Simple Storage Service Developer Guide.

properties.name: Rules
properties.description: A replication rule that specifies which objects to replicate and where they are stored.
